name: Battle for Harbour Command
overview: You are the commander of a small harbour in Cornwall when you are attacked by a squadron of Fokker bi-planes. Your only armament is an ancient Boer war cannon. Known by it's full title on the boxart and in-game as just Harbour Command, this game was featured on the cassette bundled with the Micro User, vol. 3, issue 6, in August 1985. It was also available to download from the BBC Ceefax service in September 1988.
